layout.underConstruction: This section is still under construction.

home.intro1: Laolol is a platform to help English-speaker and French-speaker to learn lao language.
home.intro2: It can be used by Lao-speaker as well, to learn english and french.

about.presLaolol1: After a few months of voluntary work on Laolol, we decided to go further!
about.presLaolol4: to imply every person interested in the support of lao language, and to give a free way for laotians to learn english and french languages.
about.presLaolol6: we will be able to do a big step further: new words, images, sounds, and little remunerations for any contributor in Laos.
about.presLaolol9: , useful to communicate about our project and to arouse everyone's curiosity on
about.presLaolol10: You will be able to follow every new step on
about.presLoic1: is a web application developer, expert in JavaScript, working between France, Belgium and Laos
about.presLoic2: Passionate about computer science, and student in Lao language, he is in charge of developing the computerized part of
about.presLoic3: To do this, he uses tools like
about.presLoic4: You can help him by contributing to the shared working repository
about.presSoulisack1: is PhD in social and pedagogical sciences, professor of languages (French, English, Lao, Vietnamese) and researcher in anthropology and linguistics
about.presSoulisack2: He heads the Department of Social Sciences at the University of Health Sciences in Vientiane, Laos
about.presSoulisack3: He brings his linguistic expertise for the choice of themes and words (items) to be learned on LaoLol. He is also responsible for all lao translations on the website
